duties_responsibilities.duty: Underwrite insurance policies with a high attention to detail and accuracy.
Provide excellent customer service and communicate effectively with clients and stakeholders.
Utilize MS Office tools to organize and manage underwriting documentation.
Demonstrate creativity and intellectual curiosity in approaching underwriting challenges.
Maintain strong time management skills to meet underwriting deadlines.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred but not required.
Completion of insurance and/or financial designations is a plus.
